action.action-desc: Mr. Stockman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To study the effect of the Earth’s magnetic field on the weather.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stockman Effect Act.

paragraph.text: Prior to a magnetic polar shift, there is a decline in the Earth’s magnetic fields.
Decrease in magnetic fields could impact global temperatures.
There is a possibility that the reason Mars lost its atmosphere was because of the loss of its magnetic field.

subsection.text: The director of the National Science Foundation shall commission a study on the impact that a shift in the Earth’s magnetic field could have on the weather.
